# HanziStrokes
**HanziStorkes** is a javascript class to show Chinese Strokes in animation.

## Usage Sample:
```
<style>
.canvas-bishun{
    position:absolute;
    border: 1px solid #3333ff;
    width: 100px;
    height: 100px;
    top: 20px;
    background-color: #99ccff;
}
</style>
<canvas id="canvas-bishun" class="canvas-bishun" width="800" height="800"></canvas>
```

```javascript
<script>

var data="208,8-208,8-223,33-206,25-203,41-237,58-232,73-200,58-193,72-220,85-211,99-187,87-180,102-203,113-195,127-173,116-167,131-187,140-179,154-160,145-153,160-171,168-163,182-147,174-140,189-155,196-146,210-134,204-127,218-138,224-129,237-120,233-111,246-120,251-112,264-102,260-93,273-103,278-94,291-84,287-75,300-83,304-73,317-64,313-52,325-62,329-56,336-40,336#184,184-168,168-185,164-189,183-205,177-202,160-218,156-222,172-238,168-235,152-251,149-255,166-272,165-268,145-282,130-290,165-306,159-299,129-320,144-320,144#272,160-303,161-293,174-272,161-268,178-283,187-272,199-261,192-253,207-262,212-254,226-246,221-239,236-246,240-238,254-232,250-224,264-232,264#128,240-128,240-140,259-128,257-129,274-151,278-152,295-135,291-136,308-152,311-152,328-136,325-136,342-152,345-152,361-136,358-136,375-152,378-152,394-136,391-136,408-152,411-152,428-136,425-136,441-152,444-152,461-136,458-136,474-152,477-149,493-133,490-130,506-146,509-144,525-127,522-124,538-141,542-138,558-121,554-118,570-135,574-131,589-115,586-111,602-126,605-119,620-108,618-104,634-111,635-103,651-95,649-86,664-96,666-88,681-78,679-68,694-81,696-67,710-56,708-44,722-53,724-40,736-32,736#152,296-152,280-166,278-169,294-185,291-182,275-198,272-201,288-217,285-214,269-231,266-234,282-250,279-247,263-263,259-266,276-282,273-279,256-296,253-299,270-315,267-312,250-327,242-331,265-348,265-341,228-344,224-360,240#327,260-350,260-344,276-328,276-328,292-344,293-344,309-328,308-328,324-344,325-344,341-328,341-328,357-344,357-344,373-328,373-328,389-344,390-344,406-328,405-328,421-344,422-344,438-328,437-328,454-344,454-344,470-328,470-328,486-344,486-344,503-328,502-328,518-344,519-344,535-328,534-328,551-344,551-344,567-328,567-328,583-344,583-344,600-328,599-328,615-344,616-344,632-328,631-328,647-344,648-344,664-328,664-325,680-344,680-344,696-315,695-320,712-340,712-336,728-336,728#324,690-312,704-300,693-311,681-298,670-288,681-276,669-284,660-280,656-264,656#176,400-160,384-178,383-181,400-199,398-196,381- -494,529-491,510-507,508-510,527-526,524-524,507-540,506-542,522-559,520-556,503-572,499-575,517-591,515-588,494-604,490-607,513-623,510-620,486-636,482-639,508-656,506-652,478-668,475-672,503-688,501-684,475-702,486-704,499-720,496-720,496#504,280-504,280-521,297-506,297-508,313-538,314-540,331-509,329-511,346-534,347-528,363-512,362-512,378-528,379-528,395-512,395-512,411-528,411-528,428-512,427-512,443-528,444-528,460-512,460-512,476-528,476-528,493-512,492-512,508-528,509-528,525-512,525-512,541-528,541-528,558-512,557-512,573-528,574-528,590-512,590-512,606-528,606-528,623-512,622-512,638-528,639-528,655-512,655-512,671-528,672-528,688-507,687-500,703-528,704-526,720-500,719-510,736-523,736-520,752-520,752";

var hs = new HanziStrokes({
    canvas_id : "canvas-bishun",
    data      : data
});
hs.show();
hs.animate();
</script>
```
